This page on SteamDB showcases a curated list of games tagged as 'City Builder'. City Builder is a genre of strategy video games where players are tasked with designing, planning, and managing various aspects of a virtual city or settlement. These aspects can range from zoning and land use to infrastructure development and public services management. City Builder games often provide players with the tools to create complex and intricate urban environments, allowing for unique and dynamic simulations that can evolve over time. The 'City Builder' tag on SteamDB automatically updates to include newly released or tagged games in this category, providing a comprehensive and up-to-date resource for fans of urban planning and city simulation games.
